title: Trek Top Fuel gets trail rated with longer travel in carbon or alloy
content:
The engineers at Trek are refreshing another popular model in less than two years, the long-running Top Fuel. Yes, this mountain bike just recently received an overhaul, but the Trek team decided it could be even better and more funâ€¦ as a longer travel, more capable trail bike! 2022 Trek Top Fuel mountain bike goes
